text: hotel yang nyaman dan tenang.  kamarnya luas dan bersih,Udara  sekitarnya sangat sejuk dan menyegarkan. Kolam renang nya bersih, pelayanannya  ramah, sarapannya juga enak, so mantaplah kalau mau menginap di tempat ini
title: hotel yang nyaman

text:
Lu mesti coba deh. Ini hotel ga gitu mewah tapi adem dan asri. Pelayanan staff juga ramah dan siap membantu. 
.
Kamar juga bersih dan lokasi strategis, tidak  terlalu jauh dari pusat kota. Untuk sarapan saya kira rasanya biasa, but its still recommended
title: Hotel keren khas sumatera

text: Pelayanan nya bagus, ramah dan cepat dalam melayani. tempat nya juga asri dan segar karena banyak pepohonan. Cocok untuk tempat menginap sekeluarga. Kamar nya juga bersih dan terawat. Cukup recomended sih.
title: Nyaman

text:
hotelnya sangat bagus berada dilingkungan tumbuhan hijau, sisi lain saya sangat nyaman bermalam disini apalagi breakfast di balkon kamar sangat menikmati serasa di village pegunungan.

fasilitas kamarnya juga bagus, serta wifi yang berkecepatan kencang,
title: Hotel yang penuh lingkungan hijau

text: Hotel ini tempatnya asri banyak tanaman dan ramah lingkungan. Udaranya segar dan menyenangkan. Penataan exteriornya sangat menarik. Pelayanan receptionisnya baik dan ramah. Desain interiornya menawan. Kamar cukup luas dan bersih. Penataan dalam kamar baik dan serasi. Tv nya berjalan normal serta akses Wifinya cukup lancar. Tempatnya nyaman sehingga menginap disini dapat tidur dengan nyenyak. Kolam renangnya bagus dengan pemandangan yang indah. Variasi menu masakan di resto cukup variatif dan rasa masakannya enak.
title: Nyaman dan Asri

text: Tempatnya nyaman dan tenang,kolam renangnya bagus viewnya menghadap sungai dan alam.namun stafnya kurang banyak.jam breakfast lebih baik di percepat.untuk restorannya rasa makanannya tidak ada yang luar biasa.
title: Nice place for relax in the middle of city

text: Hotel yang teduh di alam yang hijau. Kami menginap di family room selama dua malam dan pilhan kami amat tepat. Tidur kami sekeluarga nyenyak dan rasa penat hilang seketika, Kamar kami di kelilingi pepohonan yang teduh, tupai melompat dari pohon ke pohon lainnya. Saya amat menyukai pilihan warna di kamar perpaduan perabot yang dipakai. Lampu dinding dan lampu meja amat selaras disusun. Sarapan pagi juga bervariasi, nasi goreng, mie goreng, lemper, cake roll amat disukai oleh anak anak kami. Hotel ini hanya mempunyai 14 kamar, hotel kecil sehingga perhatian dari staff benar benar sempurna. Jauh hiruk pikuk dari kota memang pilihan kami. Kami akan kembali ke hotel ini dengan service yang amat menyenangkan, staff ramah dan sopan. Anak anak kami menikmati bermain di kolam renang disuasana yang asri. Terima kasih Deli River untuk pelayanan dan suasana yg sempurna.
title: Hotel dengan pemandangan dan suasana yang asri dan indah

text: sangat cocok bagi yang suka ketenangan....kamar sederhana, dan bersih..tidak menyediakan odol gigi dikamar jadi tamu harus membawa sendiri, menu sarapan terbatas. staf hotel lambat...saya harus membawa koper sendiri sewaktu cekin..lokasi agak susah dicari apalagi bagi tamu dari luar kota
title: Rata rata

text: Setelah penat dengan pesta pernikahan, kami memutuskan untuk istirahat di hotel ini selama dua malam. Kamar Honeymoon room suite menjadi pilihan kami. Hotel ini amat nyaman karena jauh dari hiruk-pikuk lalu lintas. Di pagi hari kami menikmati suara kicauan burung dan di malam hari suasana tenang hanya suara daun-daun yang ditiup angin dari pepohonan disamping kamar kami. Desain dan perpaduan warna kamar membuat kami betah disini dan sinar lampu dari meja dan dinding membuat suasana  bertambah romantis. Staff di restaurant ramah dan flexible. Takkan kami lupakan kami berenang di kolam renang seolah olah kolam pribadi bunga kertas yang warna-warni, hibiscus, melati dan bunga ros, serta alamanda kuning membuat suasana di alam nan hijau menjadi sempurna. Terima kasih buat seluruh staff hotel Deli River kami akan kembali lagi ke hotel ini.
title: Istirahat yang sempurna

text: Kami sekeluarga menghabiskan weekend selama 2 malam menginap di hotel ini. Kamar yang amat nyaman di kelilingi oleh pohon dan bunga warna warni. Dari teras kamar, kami dapat mengikuti kegiatan tupai yang bergerak cepat dan gesit. Sangat menyenangkan buat anak-anak yang melihatnya. Suara kicauan burung silih berganti membuat pagi menjadi sungguh menyenangkan. Di pagi hari kami disambut dengan sapa dan senyum ramah oleh waiters dan sajian makan pagi yang enak dan bervariasi. Kolam berenang membentang di tengah alam yang  hijau dan bunga warna warni. Hotel ini berbeda dengan yang ada di tengah kota. Kamarnya yang masih bergaya tradisional sangatlah nyaman, meskit tidak mewah seperti kebanyakan hotel di tengah kota. Bagi pecinta alam dan ketenangan hotel ini sangatlah cocok.
title: Hotel di alam yg hijau dan asri

text: Hotel deli berada dilokasi stategis...Menginap dihotel ini harapan saya seperti difoto kamarnya...tp ternyata biasa saja...tidak sebagus diiklannya...pelayanan hotel juga menurut saya kurang senyum sapa salam yang harusnya wajib...
title: Biasa saja

text:
Saya datang dengan keluarga dan memesan 2 kamar lewat traveloka. Dengan jumlah tamu 4 dewasa 2 anak dibawah 6 thn. (Jumlah 6 orang)
Pelayan bernama elly sangat tidak ramah ketika istri saya tidak mau menambah extra bed dan extra breakfast. Karena menurut istri saya sangat wajar bila 1 kamar di isi oleh 2 tamu dewasa dan 1 anak usia di bawah 6 thn . Dan akhirnya pihak hotel bertoleransi untuk tidak menambahkan chas extra bed kepada kami .Dan untuk breakfast kami memilih untuk membicarakanya esok pagi

Kami di sediakan kamar di lantai 3 , seharusnya pihak hotel tidak memberikan kami kamar di lantai 3 melihat kami membawa anak anak , tetapi saya tidak mau mempermasahkannya dan menerima saja. Tentu saja tidak ada satu staff pun yg membantu membawa koper maupun barang bawaan kami. 

Esok pagi saat kami akan breakfast kami hanya 3 org dewasa dan 2 anak anak. Ibu saya tidak ikut breakfast melihat lokasi tempat breakfast menyulitkan dia karna harus turun dari lantai 3 dan berjalan sekitar 20 meter lagi.
 Sampainya di tempat breakfast seorang pegawai langsung menyambut kami, dia bertanya kami dari kamar brp?  Setelah kami memberitahu kamar kami , pelayan tersebut menyuruh dua org dari kami untuk breakfast di restoran ,sebab hanya 4 org yang mendapatkan free.sungguh mengagetkan dan hal yg memalukan buat saya. Pelayan tersebut bicara seperti itu tanpa melihat dahulu jumlah kami, seolah olah kami merasa seperti di usir dari tempat itu.

Setelah saya bicara bahwa saya hanya datang dengan 3 org dewasa dan 2 anak anak baru pelayan tersebut mengerti.dan mengijinkan saya breakfast .dia hanya bilang  bahwa ia hanya di perintahkan oleh atasannya untuk mengatakan dan menginformasikan kepada saya. 

Menurut pendapat pribadi saya sepertinya pihak hotel takut kami tidak bisa membayar extra breakfast . Ini sangat menyinggung kami sekeluarga

Kami merasa seperti di awasi dan  oleh karyawan  di sana...mungkin karena kami bersitegang di awal mengenai masalah extra bed.

Saya dan istri tidak sarapan sebab hilang selera kami . saya hanya menyuruh 2 anak serta pengasuh saya untuk makan secepatnya ... sebab ketidaknyaman pelayanan di sana kami segera bergegas pagi pagi  chek out dari hotel tersebut. 
 
Sangat menyesal sudah membawa keluarga saya berlibur ke sana.
title: Tidak ramah sangat mengecewakan

text:
Sangat tidak nyaman . Pelayanan Cs yang buruk. Sangat tidak profesional. Tidak ada yg membantu membawa koper anda.
Satu kamar hanya boleh untuk dua orang saja, mereka akan meminta anda menambah extra bed bila anda membawa 1 anak anda meskipun usianya 5 tahun. Serta mereka juga akan meminta anda tambahan breakfast untuk anak anak. 
Saya datang dengan suami , ibu dan pengasuh anak saya . Serta 2 anak saya yang usianya 5 dan 2.5 thn
Saya memesan 2 kamar. 
Saya menolak menambah extra bed, menurut saya wajar 1 kamar di isi oleh 2 dewasa 1 anak anak.
Sikap Cs seperti tidak senang, selesai masalah extra bed, Cs meminta saya untuk menambah extra breakfast untuk 2 org anak saya... Saya menolak, sebab breakfast masih besok pagi dan masi bisa diurus besok. 
Sungguh pengalaman yang tidak menyenagkan... 
Saya tidak akan pernah kembali lagi ke hotel ini
Percuma tempat yg baik bila pelayanan di awal sangat tidak menyenangkan..
Hanya kak rina yg saya liat selalu tersenyum dan sangat giat berkerja.
title: Pelayanan yang buruk

text: Hanya terdapat sekitar 8 kamar di resor ini dan semua kamarnya melihat ke sebuah danau kecil dengan pemandangan alam yang indah. Sebuah tempat yang sempurna jika Anda menginginkan ketenangan dan keheningan. Pegawainya sangat ramah, membantu dan menerima. Kami merasa seolah kami sedang berada di rumah. Kami menginap di sana selama 4 hari dan kami mengambil 2 kamar twin dengan pintu penghubung termasuk sarapan pagi hanya seharga USD544, masing-masing USD68 per kamar per malam. Restoran "Omlandia" menyajikan makanan yang lezat dan tidak perlu keluar dari resor untuk makan siang atau malam karena harganya tidak terlalu mahal. Ini adalah sebuah tempat yang tenang dan damai. Kami melapor masuk sekitar jam 9 pagi dan melapor keluar sekitar jam 2.30 siang tanpa biaya tambahan. Transportasi tidak bermasalah karena mereka memiliki anak perusahaan bernama Trijaya Travel dan Anda bisa mengatur keperluan untuk penjemputan dan wisata.
title: Sebuah suaka untuk relaksasi.

text:
Di Indonesia kami mengunjungi pulau Sumatra, khusus untuk menelusuri asal-muasal kami dan untuk pertama kalinya dalam 55 tahun. Mencari di internet untuk penginapan, kami menemui sebuah halaman web tentang Hotel Deli River di Medan. Kami menelepon mereka dan dalam 24 jam kami menerima sebuah proposal yang detil berisi "wisata-kenangan" pribadi kami berdasarkan keinginan-keinginan yang kami kemukakan. 
Pengaturan perjalanan kami, penjemputan di bandara dan penerimaan yang ramah di hotel merupakan permulaan dari sebuah liburan yang sempurna.

Mobil privat kami dikemudikan dengan baik oleh Dedy Suhaidi. Tidak sedetikpun kami merasa tidak nyaman saat diantar melalui lalu lintas khas Indonesia. Dedy menjadi pemandu pribadi kami, bahasa Inggrisnya lebih dari cukup, dia bahkan bisa sedikit bahasa Belanda, dan dia bertindak sebagai seorang juru bahasa dalam komunikasi kami dengan penduduk lokal. Dan yang paling penting, dia selalu bersikap rendah hati, santun dan ramah. Mobilnya dibersihkan setiap hari, bagian dalam dan luar.
Rekomendasi saya: mintalah untuk Dedy!!!
title: Hotel yang sempurna, pengaturan yang sempurna.

text:
Tidak ada tempat yang lebih baik untuk memulai dan mengakhiri perjalanan Anda ke Sumatera Utara. Bagai oase yang damai di hiruk pikuknya kota Medan. Kami mencintai arsitektur yang sesuai dengan lingkungannya. Terdapat pondok dan restoran di kedua sisi kolam. 
Pondok dilengkapi teras, lapang, bersih dan sangat nyaman. Kamar mandi bersahaja, bersih dan berfungsi dengan baik. 

Bangunannya tidak hanya indah, atap tinggi tanpa plafon memberi  nuansa yang sejuk dan menawarkan perlindungan. Banyak detail yang cerdik, seperti pencahayaan dan dekorasi yang menjadi saksi bisu besarnya cinta dan pengabdian para pemilik terhadap karyanya. 
Pelayanannya sangat bersahabat. 
Makanan enak, sayuran segar selalu dihidangkan di setiap waktu makan, dan yang paling utama, buah-buahan segar yang melimpah. Mereka bahkan menyajikan selai bikinan sendiri saat sarapan. 
Kami melakukan perjalanan yang seru selama empat hari ke danau Toba, Samosir dan Brastagi. Sopir kami santai dan tidak ngebut, serta sangat informatif.
title: Lokasi yang sejuk di pusat keramaian

text: We stayed 3 nights in this hotel. We  loved the quiet and relaxed atmosphere. Although there is a mosque in the area we were not disturbed by the prayer and had a very good sleep. The staff was very helpfull, they were kind and assisted us with everything including carrying our  luggage to the room. We enjoyed the food, the swimmingpool and the green environment
title: Quiet and relaxed.

text:
We stayed here twice on our visit to Sumatra and were given the same rooms both times.  Rooms were good size with comfortable beds, we had interconnecting as a family of 4.  Air conditioning, filtered water, tea coffee facilities.  The bathrooms as with all were tired but functional, no complaints.

Breakfast is a buffet of fruit, bread and pastries and of course fried rice.  They will cook eggs to order and probably other things too.  Staff are very friendly and eager to help.  Lunch/dinner menu is good on both Asian and western food fronts.

Pool area is good for killing a few hours and there is a small zip wire and various hammocks in the grounds to keep kids amused.  

It is an 1/1.5hrs from the airport.  I have no idea what other closer options there are but if you are literally wanting a bed between flights there might be a closer option.  Otherwise all good.
title: Good stop over hotel

text:
Nice and clean place, very friendly staff, nice swimming pool is very beautiful.

The staff helped us on many points.
Honnestly, even the breakfast was full of fruits/ all you need and served with a beautiful smile.
title: Perfect place to discover and/or leave Medan

text: We spent two nights here at the start of our holiday is Sumatra and the final night before flying to Singapore.The drive from the airport takes around 45 minutes - but Deli River has lovely grounds and is located close to the City.The rooms are adequate - bed has a firm mattress and bathroom (shower over bath) unfortunately shower is badly positioned - need to take care not to flood bathroom.Soap, toilet paper and towels are provided.The room has air conditioning, one easy chair and t.v.Breakfast was included in our packages - it was far more than we could eat. Staff were friendly - communication was easy.
title: A pleasant place to stay

text: Hotel Deli River also runs TriJaya Tours of Sumatra of varying duration.  The hotel is situated in a calming environment, has a relaxing pool and acreage providing its own fruit and produce.  Rooms are clean and well maintained.  The cuisine, however, was the only bland food we tasted in Indonesia, perhaps catered to Western taste buds?  The Rendang wasn’t the tender meat that’s the hallmark of Rendang.  The drinks, however, were fresh and refreshing.
title: Beautiful location amid lush grounds

text: We stayed at Deli River for two nights in April. The rooms are lovely and spacious with nice outdoor verandas, overlooking the gorgeous gardens. The staff were delightful and helpful, the food was excellent, the hotel has a lovely pool. It is an oasis in a very bustling part of the world.
title: Beautiful hotel and gardens

text: I paid Rp.760.000 per night however Rp.350.000 seems the appropriate price based on the quality and lack of luxury. For pros: the grounds are kept quite clean and the pool is fantastic. The rooms are large and have lots of seating. For the cons: the 1 hammock isn't usable and needs to be replaced. No bottled water in the room, only boiled local water. It's 24.000 for a 1.5L bottle from the restaurant while it's only 5.500 outside the gate. The indo cuisine prices were way too high for the quality of establishment and the taste was bland. Luckily you can use go-jek to bring in tasty food from outside. The reviewers who mentioned the staff are rude were actually talking about a single employee. She is rude and insulting and you will run in to her all the time however she has absolutely no idea that she's offending anyone and my heart goes out to her because I saw her interacting with another guest and he was blowing her off the same way I was and I realized the poor girl has no idea why people are short with her. A tip for her: don't talk over your guests while they are talking to you, it is extremely condescending. You also don't always have to talk to the guests when you see them and you shouldn't comment on personal things they are doing. If a guest asks you something, they want conversation, don't interrupt them and try to send them away with instructions that are only based on the first couple words you heard before you cut them off. I honestly think she she's trying her best to act like a professional she saw on TV but instead is coming across rude.
title: Price doesn't match product

owner_response.text:
Honoured guest,

Thank you for your review. Concerning the price of our restaurant, we believe our food is reasonably priced. Pecel vegetable salad with peanut sauce and peanut crackers at Rp. 39.000 (around US$ 2.40) and spring rolls consisting of 2 pieces for Rp. 30.000 (US$ 2.20). A Nasi Goreng costs IDR 57.000 which is equivalent to US$ 4.50. This meal consists of Nasi Goreng with omelette, fried chicken, salad and krupuk (shrimp crackers), which is not overpriced at all. These prices are not expensive, we use fresh spices from our garden and all meals are freshly prepared. Almost all our guests praise the food and taste of the meals prepared by our kitchen staff. Concerning the drinking water in your room, we provide clean carbon filtered drinking water to our guests. This drinking water is of excellent quality. As we strive to reduce the use of plastics in our hotel we explicitly stated in our policy that we use re-fillable water bottles instead of plastic bottles as we are concerned about the environment. For the same reason we use solar tuff heating systems to provide warm water in our rooms as we all know that solar energy is environment friendly. The hammock in our garden you mentioned is still good, maybe it was placed too low but it can be used for those who like to relax in our garden. In our garden are at least 20 species of tropical birds which you can hear and see from your private terrace. Our comfortable airconditioned rooms are designed with utmost care and our rooms are fitted with unique classical Javanese hand made furniture which is very much appreciated by many guests as you can read in other comments. Last but no least we like to react on your comment about the attitude of our staff. You stayed 5 nights in our hotel and had only 1 time breakfast for the rest you did not communicate with our staff. We do not understand how  our staff could be impolite as there was almost no communication with you. Other guests did not complain about the attitude of our staff, on the contrary they praised our staff’s hospitality, integrity and professionalism as you can read in countless previous comments. We are a small eco friendly family hotel and we strive to give excellent service. Management Hotel Deli River.
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: A great place to rest from the busy city of Medan, with lovely views from the room and a large, airy restaurant area where I'd spend many hours. Also, the staff were extremely friendly. The perfect place to digest a month in Sumatra.
title: Beautiful and restful

text:
Situated a few kilometres outside Medan proper, this hotel is situated off a main road with a large lake as the centre piece and the administration and dining / reception areas in one place with accommodation in groups of 4 which are more like 2 storey homes than hotel rooms.

The rooms are spacious with large bathrooms and balconies off the room where one can sit and daydream or read with views of the lake in front. All are very tastefully furnished with very comfortable beds. At the time we stayed there the lotus flowers on the lake were starting to bloom and Dragon flys rested on the blooms - a nice effect!

All the staff we encountered during our stay were pleasant and helpful. Breakfasts provided in our tariff were brilliant, plentiful  with lots of variety. Evening meals are just the same.

We had a very restful few days there and swam in the hotel pool which was a pleasant place to relax.

And the 3 ducks roaming about the property added to the experience!

Will definitely visit there again
title: A hotel that's more like someone's home

owner_response.text:
Dear Ron,

Thank you for your excellent review. We are glad to know that you enjoyed your stay in our place.

We are looking forward to welcoming you again.

With kind and sweet regards from all of us here,
Elly, Shah Fitri, Ayu, Rina, Indah, Wina, Naniek, Lala, Diana
🌺🌸🌻😍
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

photos.caption: Dragon fly resting on Lotus bulb

text: We stayed one night after a long way back from Ketambe so did appreciate the confort of this nice hotel conveniently located in Medan as not far from the center and still surrounded by nice countryside. Rooms was confortable, and convenient for families. Pool nice with great views. Food average.
title: Perfect for a stay in Medan, close from center yet outside of city

text:
Very friendly staf, they are always prepared to help and answer your questions.
Breakfast buffet and diner with a large choice are great. Rooms are nice and comfortable. Beautiful view and a nice swimmingpool. Really everthing is OK.
title: Deli river: super!

text:
This was a peaceful property, perfect for getting away for a little R&R from an urban city. The mgmt staff and owners were incredibly attentive to our needs, especially since my husband was recovering from illness. The fresh air, the green surroundings, the vast areas that could accommodate those with limited mobility were the perfect environment for my husband to exercise and perform physical therapy. We highly recommend this property for anyone looking for relaxation, getting away from the city, and to reconnect with nature. 

The owners are Diana and Dirk, and it is very apparent that they pour their heart and soul into the resort. Their staff are very well trained and work seamlessly to ensure that the guests are content and satisfied. 

We would definitely make a return trip, and bring along some family and friends to share our wonderful experience at Hotel Deli River.
title: A cozy resort away from the hustle and bustle of the city

text: This is a wonderful hotel.It is a relaxed cosy and calm oasis away from the bustle of Medan. The staff welcome you like family ,service is excellent. The rooms are charming with great hot showers and effective air conditioning. I loved  sitting on the terrace overlooking the lake and gardens The whole hotel is spotlessly clean and well maintained .I loved sitting in the pool watching people fishing in the river below . We enjoyed all the food we ate in the restaurant and loved our breakfast with delicious pastries and excellent coffee . If I am ever lucky enough to return to beautiful Sumatra this would be the first place on my list
title: Wonderful Hotel

text: This place was recommended to us by Sumatra EcoTravel for our final night to be closer to the airport in Medan. And wow were we impressed! Such a little oasis for being close to the city. The setting was lovely, rooms were comfortable, food was excellent, pool was nice but the service was AMAZING! Elly was the most friendly and sweet person we came across in Indonesia! We LOVE their eco commitment - no straws, reducing single use plastic and have filtered water jugs in rooms instead of bottles. This is fantastic to see! Vegan friendly too and the options we had were delicious! Definitely recommend this place!
title: A wonderful one night stay - impressive!

text:
We chose Deli River hotel again for our second honeymoon.. Yep, my hubby and I love this place so much because this place make us feel at home, far from the crowded town, can relieve the stress from work.. The honeymoon suite room became our choice.. The swimming pool was clean with nice view of the Deli river. I think they upgraded the menu because now there are so many choices to eat.. I like the "poffertjes" and my hubby like "beef and cheese sandwich" which they made using their special homemade olive tapenade and tomato relish. It's so yummy. 🤗🤗
And again even for the second time we had a wonderful and memorable stay at Deli River hotel.
title: Our honeymoon 😍

text:
Resort is located on the outskirts of medan and is an hour ride away from the airport. Took us a bit longer due to traffic. We had arranged a pick up from the resort. The driver was on time friendly and was careful. Though the rates very a tad higher we were ok with it. Rooms are clean comfortable and had a nice feel to it. The Air conditioning is insufficient and takes a while to cool the room. Since the climate was good we did not have issue. Some of the rooms have mosquito net over the beds but our room had not and we were asked to keep the doors closed to avoid mosquitos getting inside the room. To be safe we used skin cream against mosquito bites.
The swimming is clean and the view from the edge of it is nice. You can see a bit of deli river which at the moment is low on water people fishing and lots and lots of trees. Lunch and dinner was very good. All the food items are freshly prepared from locally sourced items. The cost may be a bit higher but since its organic we did not feel it expensive and the taste was great. The service was good and prompt but some of the waitresses did not have a good grasp of English but made their best efforts to explain all our questions. There are a few restaurants outside the hotel which serve local food and a fruit  market which is walkable distance but we did not try them. IMO the place is good and service is good and if I were to travel again I will pick them again.
title: Nice ambience

text: I'm not sure what the other choices in Medan are like, but this hotel is average at best.  The rooms are very basic. When we were there the pool was too cold but also nothing special. I don't really remember the food at all, which isn't a good sign.
title: Not so great

text: We’ve recently stayed at the Deli River on our arrival and departure from Sumatra and I would highly recommend it.  They are vegan friendly and also working on the plastic problem in Sumatra by eliminating straws; educating people, etc.  The hotel has a very professional and nice staff who are very accommodating, even for people like us who had to leave st 2:30 in the morning!  The setting is also exquisite.
title: A wonderful vegan and eco friendly oasis in Medan

text:
When I booked through online app, I was confuse and bit not confidence. Why?
When I called the number after 9pm no one pick up only the security. Point of it don’t ever book go show in the night coz no staff there if want to stay immediately.

After I think about it and booked it.
When check in after 6pm it was great welcoming from all those staff even the owner of the resort ( standing ovation ).

During weekday on that period only me ( family ) and 1 foreigner who stays there.

I choose family room for 4 of us.
The lobby includes the dinning and breakfast room are quite fancy and feels like at home it means comfort.
Got welcoming drink also got welcoming note from the management.

This resort quite big as a resort in Deli Serdang area and easy to find near the main road, it tools 30 Minutes plus Minutes to Medan city. Quit place and relax from the crowd.
Room big enough but not too big, it’s Fix for 4 person ( family room ), has a sitting area front the room if for smoking. In the room strictly not allows to smoke.
Nice bed and good bathroom , has out door shower on the second room.
For improve have to put mosquito spray in room coz some season has so many mosquitos.
It’s green resort has so many trees, and the pool side awesome view to the river. Ah gréât !
Breakfast they server meals during our stay. Great staff over all.

Satisfied to stay here.
title: Stunning environment

text:
Very friendly staff, great breakfast! 
Nice, clean rooms and a pool with a great view! 
We really enjoyed our stay! 
A great and quiet place to stay. 

We booked a 10 day tour via them as well. This was perfectly arranged!
title: Very nice and quiet place to stay

text:
A holiday that turn up to be z memorable experience.
A very nice and beautiful set up hotel. The food was so tasty and has a lot of variety due to different ethnic style of food.
Walking in the streets city give u a picture where to buy what u need.
A lot of handy work n souvenir to choose from.
title: Lovely place

text:
We stayed here for 3 nights and we were having a great time. The staff (especially Elly) are so friendly and will help you with everything. 
The room are also great and you feel like you are back in an old movie. 
Everything here are just really great.
title: So nice.

text:
Overview; a couple travelling for 6 weeks, we stayed here for one night when arriving in Sumatra and for 2 nights at the end of our 2 weeks of travelling (organised by Tri Jaya (via the hotel).
Arrival; we arrived late having had a delayed and long flight, I had organised a driver via the hotel who thoughtfully asked if we had eaten and took us to a very reasonable local restaurant before taking us to the hotel.
Room; very nice, plenty of space, lots of hot water (difficult not to flood the floor when having a shower though!).
Food; breakfast, nice outlook, served pastries, breads, eggs and fruit, good.  Dinner, very good.
Outside spaces and area; lovely pool, well kept garden, very quiet, nice to be away from the madness of Medan. We walked out of the hotel which I think was unusual as the local people definitely wanted to stop and talk to us. We did go to get some water (only complaint very expensive in the hotel). Great local knowledge and they really care about your trip, many thanks.
title: Very quiet and comfortable

text:
This hotel is so nice. You think you are in the middle of nowhere although you are in the city center. The surroundings are beautiful! 

The breakfast was really as if you were in a little paradise. They bring lots of different plates with bread, fruit and delicious fresh shakes! This was so great.

The view was fantastic and the rooms are lovely. The WiFi was working in the houses which was great for us as well.

The owner is Dutch so you are able to order Dutch specialities such as the so called 'bitterballen'. 

Overall is was a great experience!
title: Fantastic!

text: It's been about 5 years since we last stayed at the Deli Rvier hotel, and availed ourselves of their transport services. Great to see this oasis in Medan thriving. The city of Medan is far from beautiful, hence why when needing somewhere to rest your head prior to heading off on the adventures of Bukit Lawang or further afield it's important to enjoy the sanctuary Deli River provides. Beacuase you can be sure that the next part of your journey will be long and arduous given Sumatra's roads. Rest and let the good people of Deli River take care of you.
title: Always a pleasure

text:
Hotel Deli River is an oasis just outside teeming, steaming Medan. It has wonderful architecture inspired by the local culture and beautifully designed and kept grounds that make it a pleasure to be there. The bedrooms were tastefully charming, clean, and above all comfortable. The hotel is located a little outside the city, so it is best booked when you want to recover from jetlag and have no interest in the challenge of the city. 
There is a large and pleasant swimming pool on the premises where you can spend happy hours but no attractions within walking distance. You can plan your North Sumatran journey from the hotel as they have plenty of information and nobody knows more about Medan than the owner who has written several books on it. 
Deli River is a getaway where you can rest, eat good food, and enjoy peace and serene quiet.The staff are excellent.
title: Best Place in Medan

text: The hotel is very peaceful with beautiful landscaping, buildings. Staff as well as owners were very friendly and offered an excellent introduction to the local area. On my second day of my stay I was invited by one of the owners to participate in the local Hash were I had the opportunity to meet some locals and trek through the forest.
title: Very nice place, excellent staff and owners

text: We had a fantastic time at Hotel Deli River.  The hotel environment was beautiful and very diligently maintained by the hard-working grounds staff.  The location was exactly what we wanted; away from hustle and bustle.  The restaurant served exceptionally delicious food and a wide range of it too.  Staff were more than just professionally competent and efficient, they were genuinely friendly and cared about giving guests the best experience possible.  The room itself was clean, spacious and attractive.  The prices (room and restaurant) were more than reasonable for the quality of the experience we had.  There were literally no negative aspects to our stay at Deli River and we are very grateful to all the staff for that.  I would recommend this place most highly.
title: a holiday made easy

text: We had a great experience at the Deli River.  The owners and staff were very friendly, the food was good, the Wifi worked well, the grounds lovely, and the tours were well thought out.  Our driver, Deddy, was great.  The roads in Medan (and out to Bukit Lawang!) are a mixed bag, so be ready for potholes.  Note that it's outside the central city, which we found a plus.
title: Wonderful retreat in Medan

text: This was my second stay at Hotel Deli River and it didn't disappoint. My parents, sister, brother, sister in-law, niece and nephew all came along this time and had a great experience. The rooms are clean and comfortable. Breakfast is always a highlight. Getting my nephew out of the pool was difficult (well, getting us all out was, it's beautiful). The restaurant is good and the staff are well-trained and lovely. The grounds are great - you wouldn't know that you're in noisy, hot and grotty Medan! The trips organised by Tri Jaya tours here are also great - well organised, safe drivers, good value. We will be back!
title: Highlight of Medan

text: We sure needed this one night here after ZERO sleep at our previous location.   Lovely room, lovely gardens and absolutely awesome meal which we chose to have in our room on the balcony.   Room was extremely well appointed and very comfortable and overlooked a large lake surrounded by gorgeous gardens.
title: Hidden GEM

text: This place is just amazing! Travelers who have allready been to Medan know that this lively city can be really noisy and dirty. This is why staying at this beautiful "green oasis" only a short trip from the city center is so perfect. The rooms are also really comfortable and clean and on a hot day there is nothing better than going for a swim at the hotels pool. At the restaurant Omlandia they serve one of the best local traditional dishes we had on our trip to Indonesia and the thing we enjoyed the most was the included breakfast - so diverse! Everything was freshly prepared, even the bakery. Staff is very friendly. We would definetly stay there again!
title: Green Oasis in Medan

text: The hotel was peaceful and beautifully maintained with gardens, pond and pool. The staff were so friendly and the breakfast one of the best ever! The trips I took were also well organized and enjoyable.
title: Great place to relax!

text: Upon arriving, we were greeted by Elie ( I hope that I spelled her name correctly), who had to be the best hotel employee that I met in Indonesia.  I loved this hotel even more because of her.  She went out of way to make sure that we were taken care of.  The rooms are comfortable with everything that you could need, including an awesome fruit basket.  I could go on and on about the breakfast.  Plates just kept coming our with more treats to enjoy.  We left Indonesia with a great impression after spending our final night here.
title: Elie made our stay wonderful!

text:
A wonderful place to start and end my nostalgic trip to visit places where I had lived and gone to school, more than 65 (!) years ago. My itinerary put together by Trijaya Tours was perfect and my thoughtful driver excellent.
Diana, wife of Dirk Buiskool, owners of the hotel and travel agency and her staff, made me really feel at home. And who would not in this little paradise near the Deli river, away from the traffic and noise of big city Medan?
My only regret? I should have stayed a few days longer relaxing near the pool.
Elsebée Ortolani 
Ottawa, Canada
title: Nostalgic visit to Medan, Berastagi, Perapat, Lake Toba in Sumatra

text: My 1-night stay was absolutely delightful. I wish I had been in town longer!  This hotel is OUTSIDE of Medan, but very easy to reach from the airport.  Extremely glad not to stay in noisy dirty Medan.  I'd take the quiet, beautiful garden setting any day.  The food was good, the staff was lovely.  If I'm in this part of the world again I will return!
title: SO happy I stayed here!  Highly recommended

text:
This place is a nice oasis from the hectic city and a good place to spend some downtime. Nice pool, little lake with ducks, playground, and each room has a nice balcony/deck where you can relax. The restaurant is good...their gado gado was my favorite dish of our trip. The restaurant closes at 9 and they shut up the whole place by 10, so it's not going to be a nightlife spot:-). It is outside of the city by a good bit on a small back road, so there's nothing within walking distance (other than convenience stores and local spots on the nearby road). Good sized room, comfy (good A/C!). They offer a nice breakfast with a good array of choices.

They also arranged our whole tour (TriJaya tours) and did a great job putting it all together. Our driver, Joel, was perfectly efficient and got us safely to and fro on the tough roads. They/he made the trip easy on us.

Unfortunately, we had one negative experience that soured things quite a bit. I'm still giving this place a positive review because of their response and my overall impression. We had about $100 stolen from our room while we went on a city tour. This problem could be eliminated by providing safes in the room. We were hesitant to carry too much cash with us touring around Medan, so we went against our judgment (and their warnings that they weren't responsible for valuables left in the room) and left some cash in a compartment of a bag. Upon coming home that evening, my husband immediately noticed the zippers had been messed with and counted his money. We had 3 currencies with us, and a little bit was missing from each. 

The hotel was extremely responsive and apologetic and the woman who had cleaned the room even came over late to go over what had happened that day. The hotelier, Diana, watched the many hours of CCTV to try to ascertain if someone else had gone into the room. I appreciate their diligence and understand that these things can happen (which they did warn us of), but of course it soured our stay so we spent our last night at a hotel in the city. I mainly share this to suggest 1. you take heed of their warning about cash/valuables 2. to suggest they offer safes so they don't have to deal with these issues (it sounds as if they have quite consistent staff and have some practices in place such as having the same person clean the room the whole time a guest is there, but a safe would be the best solution).
title: Oasis

owner_response.text:
Dear SAMFLFlorida,

Thank you very much for your review. We have taken the following steps to ensure that the valuables and belongings of our guests are safeguarded.

First, we have dismissed the employee that was in charge of the maintenance of the room you were staying in. We dismissed her on the grounds that after watching 12 hours of CCTV footage we did not see anybody in the vicinity of your room besides her. Second, we are procuring safety boxes and will install them as soon as possible in all the rooms of Hotel Deli River.

We are extremely sorry that you have had to experience this and we would like to thank you for your feedback. Hotel Deli River is a small eco-friendly family hotel committed to promoting fairness, equality, women empowerment and ecological sustainability. We will work hard to always achieve our aims and we will step up our efforts to ensure that our guests have nothing but good experiences at Hotel Deli River.

 Kind Regards,

Management of Hotel Deli River
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: This place is meticulously designed and maintained. There is an obvious woman's touch in both. The staff are superb, including Ayu and Rina. The rooms are spacious and decorated with style. There are lots of small niceties. The food is excellent. Medan is a sprawling city noted more for being a gateway than a destination but this place is a good stopover. One negative is the very loud call to prayer (admittedly an external factor).
title: A woman's touch is evident in this green oasis.

text: The hotel is set in well kept peaceful gardens away from the busy city centre. (About 20 minutes by car) The room was spacious, clean and well furnished. Bed was very comfortable.  Bathroom had bathtub. TV had CNN news  (but no BBC) and free WiFi.  The staff were delightful friendly and helpful. The restaurant serves western and Indonesian food. Also beer and wine. I would stay here again.
title: Peaceful oasis

text: It was a relief to arrive in this beautiful garden after a long, busy trip from the airport of Medan. We were made to feel very welcome by the extremely friendly staff. The rooms were all large, very nicely decorated(we saw two), very private in separate houses with each their own terasse with view on the lovely gardens with mesmerizing sounds of tropical birds and frogs. The main house/restaurant in Indonesian style, very spacious and gave a feeling of grandeur of colonial times. Wonderful swimmingpool too. The owners are very knowledgable on the history of Medan and are very helpful in planning tours.
title: An Oasis of tranquillity in the middle of a very busy city

text: Hotel River Deli is the antidote to the hectic city vibe of Medan. When you arrive on property, you feel like you are on vacation. Bungalows are comfortable and air-conditioned with reliable internet. The staff is friendly and helpful. The owners Dirk and Diana are extremely knowledgeable about the history of Medan and can organize tours through their tour company, Trijaya. We did the Medan City Tour with a driver/guide named Dede, accompanied by Dirk’s book, “Tours through Historical Medan.” Dede was excellent and professional and tailored the tour to our interests. (For instance, we wanted to try the durian--"stinky"--fruit, so Dede took us to the outdoor restaurant where they serve and prepare durian.) The only challenge of being outside the city center of Medan is having to battle the traffic, which takes about an hour. If you have many errands to do in town, be prepared to have a commute, but if you’re happy with a few days of relaxation on the property, Hotel River Deli is an ideal spot.
title: Great Antidote to Hectic City

text:
We have just spent New Year at the Deli River in a last minute three-night break from Singapore. It was our second trip to Sumatra, having been to lake Toba in '92 with our baby daughter. 
And we were not disappointed!! 

Dirk and Diana couldn't have been more welcoming and Dirk even persuaded us to go on the Hash, hiking through the jungle, lots of muddy climbs and laughs. 

The hotel is beautifully laid out and I spent a good while sketching from the balcony. The staff were ready to help and served us excellent meals - e.g. simple and delicious soto ayam, satay, gado gado and Dutch poffertjes (pancakes). They also cottoned onto the fact we like strong coffee and rolled out the espresso! 

We took the Berastagi tour, spotted the volcano spitting lava and bought a stash of wonderful fruit. The drive to lake Toba was slow - we had been warned! - but definitely worth it for the fabulous view. So was the City Tour. We have visited many cities hereabouts and always enjoy the mix of old and new. Being a public holiday, there were plenty of people in Merdeka Square, playing drums and trumpets. Things I'll remember will be the lack of western tourists, and the friendliness of everyone we spoke to - even if they wanted a selfie with us. Our Bahasa is limited to a few words, but I'd love to learn more now. 

A few tips - hardened travelers won't need these - bring mozzie repellent, longlife milk (if you like milk in your tea or coffee), swimming costumes for the lovely pool, and earplugs if you don't want to hear the call to prayer and are a light sleeper. And leave behind your stress and tiredness.
title: Welcoming and relaxing

photos.caption: Sketches while sitting on my balcony

text:
Lovely hotel in tranquil surroundings on the outskirts of Medan which we stayed at the start and end of our stay in the region - a welcome break from the hustle and bustle of the city. 

Staff were always extremely friendly and helpful and arranged our airport pickup/drop off, a tour around Medan, a drop off to Bukit Lawang and even left us a meal in our room as we arrived too late to eat in the restaurant and also breakfast boxes when we left too early - these also catered for my dietary requirements! 

Across the 2 visits we also enjoyed breakfast and dinner in the restaurant. The food - a mix of Dutch and Indonesian - was fresh and delicious  and the staff always explained about the ingredients. 

We also thoroughly enjoyed the swimming pool. 

If you are looking for an escape from Medan or somewhere at the start / end of your trip we would definitely recommend!
title: Two great visits to this lovely hotel

text:
We decided to take a short end-of-year break and had the good fortune to stumble upon tripadvisor on Hotel Deli River website.

It turned out that Diana is also the travel agent.  On the spot, she planned the 4-day itinerary.

Hotel Deli River is not only an oasis in typical Indonesia town but the quality is so subtle that it is almost indiscernible down to the common tropical blossoms that decorate the table, the details in the colors and tiles of the bathroom, the cool comfort of the room without knowing where the cold air comes from.

In future, when we want a bit of Sumatran adventure, Hotel Deli River will be our preferred base and Diana the person to contact.
title: Hotel Deli River

text: After 4 days in the jungle in the north we needed two good night's sleep before catching an early flight. This well managed clean and well maintained hotel provided just that, it's beautiful within the chaos of Medan. Breakfast was great (although when we asked for milk with the coffee they brought some powder creamer, would expect more for this price) and they organised a breakfast box for us to take along to the airport. The restaurant does close quite early (21:00) for dinner so be sure to return early enough if you are to eat at the (rather pricey) restaurant. Thanks for  the nice stay and organising transport for us!
title: Oasis in Medan

text:
Awesome place to stay! What a nice little oasis to take a breath and relax - very quiet  with nice and spacious rooms, a beautiful pool, super nice staff and a just overall 'right' atmosphere.
Over and above that, the hotel offers a wide range of travel options. I joined a jungle hash which was one of the best Indonesia experiences I had so far.
title: Awesome place to relax

text:
Stayed 1 night in this hotel. We booked for 2 units of 2 rooms apartment with extra bed.
Overall we have a good sleep but just need to highlight that only 1 unit of air conditional was available in 2 rooms apartment which we think the cool air did not fully covered the area.The hot shower would rather slow during the morning bath.However , this were just a minor issue for us.
    Since all of our family member are the foodies, we recommence the banana juice which they serve as welcome drink to all...so refreshing and so healthy.
   Don't forget to mention the staff and the owner there, there are all very polite thank them on their 5 stars hospitality and service.
    The most memorial thing for me was their homemade buffet breakfast...everything was homemade included jam,bread,cake,fresh juice and their Oleh-oleh. Thumb up!
  We have use their travel agency service to Berastagi, thanks to Pak Nasib, he brought us round the whole Kota to get the pharmacy and clinic since my Daughter was not feeling well during the trip. He is really a nice driver that we ever met. Terima Kasih!
   Pls choose this hotel if you want to have a relaxing life in Medan trip, you will love it for sure!
title: Good place for relax...

text: During my six-week adventure to 9 countries in Southeast Asia, I stayed in 16 hotels.  By far, far, Hotel Deli River and Omlandia Restaurant were the very best of the best!  Everyone including the owners, the restaurant staff, the housekeeping staff, and the grounds people were fantastic!  My room was very clean, air conditioned, and very quiet.  The food was expertly prepared with good variety, both Indonesian and international.  Their water, from their own private well, is filtered multiple times and then they use it drink and to wash all the food. I know I'm using superlatives, but it's the only way I can describe how wonderful it was.  I sat by the pool every day - and jumped in every day too - and read almost a thousand pages in two great books.  A wonderful, relaxing, and warm place - both the weather and the people. If you are going the Medan, be sure to stay there.  You will love it like I did!
title: The BEST hotel on my entire six-week adventure!

text: I had the pleasure of staying at this hotel while on a tour of Northern Sumatra . It is a real oasis in bustling Medan . Rooms are beautifully appointed and the grounds are lovely and quiet . Big comfortable bed , huge bath and many extra touches, comfortable outdoor seating area overlooking the water feature and resident geese. Big bonus is the restaurant which had fresh local and western palate food choices with great flavours and enormous sized serves . Win , win. I will be going back for longer next time . Efficient friendly staff and owners top the whole package off.
title: Oasis in a busy City

text:
Hotel Deli River is a great place to stay. Away from the hustle and busle of the mertropolis Medan, you can relax here in comfort and luxury and plan new excursions.
Great care is taken by management and staff to cater for all your wishes. The food was delicious, swimming relaxing. But special mention deserves the way our Lake Toba trip was carried out by Trijaya, the organization that runs Hotel Deli River. Two weeks travelling around places that had once been familiar to me and my travelling companions with an experienced driver and guide was carried out smoothlessly. A great experience.
Nico v.d.Maas
title: A great place to stay

text: We stayed here on our first Night in Sumatra. They picked us up at the airport for a decent price although we arrived quite late. We had a nice big clean room with hot water. The next morning we woke up in a beautiful green Garden oasis and enjoyed the best breakfast in whole Sumatra. It is really delicious and everything freshly handmade. I truely recommend to stay here if you want to avoid or escape from Medan or want to relax. They have a nice pool als well.
title: This Hotel is more than 2 Stars - recommendation

text:
I just returned from a 3 ½ week holiday in Indonesia (September 2016) and only stayed one night at this hotel, before starting my 3-week holiday in Indonesia. Seeing I already arrived at 8am from Singapore, the hotel arranged a city tour of Medan and except for a lovely driver/guide Joel, who also spoke Dutch, they provided me with a 64-page booklet on historical Medan, with loads of historical information and photos. A nice touch.
I arrived about 13h at the hotel, a real peaceful oasis in hectic Medan and was met by the owner, Mr Dirk Buiskool. The hotel’s travel desk – Tri Jaya – had made all the arrangements for my stay in Sumatra, Java, Sulawesi and Komodo. Everything was impeccably organised and nowhere I had any problems, really a 5* organisation. Very recommendable, they always took them less than 24h to respond to an e-mail whilst trying to organise my trip. Excellent service!
The hotel’s gardens are lush, lovely swimming pool, the room spacious & comfortable, a large bathroom, nice terrace. Wi-Fi reception was excellent. Not a negative remark to be made. The staff are extremely friendly and attentive. Furthermore, they all speak English very well.
I had dinner at the hotel’s restaurant (called Omlandia), and the food was amongst the best I had in Indonesia and very reasonably priced. The next day’s breakfast was perfect, something for everyone’s taste. Do try the local fruit ‘Rambutan’, it is perhaps not looking appealing from the outside, but I found it to taste a bit like lychee, which I like very much.
I short, I will definitely recommend, the Deli River Hotel in Medan and Tri Jaya. It’s not a question of if, but when, I will visit Indonesia again. And I will definitely stay at this place again.
title: Best start to a 3 ½ week Indonesian holiday (Hotel & Tri Jaya)

text:
Hotel Deli River is in our opinion (family with two girls aged 6 and 8) the best place to stay in Medan. We stayed here twice for two nights  (before and after our 8-day North Sumatra tour) which we could also book right away at Deli River (Tri Jaya Tours & Travel). The hotel is set in a wonderful garden, with a little playground and a good and big pool. We had a perfect family room, always decorated with fresh flowers. The staff was always really friendly and helpful and granted every wish! 

Breakfast tops it all - it is the best breakfast we've ever had in Asia with self-baked bread and cakes, Indonesian specialities, eggs and many different fruits, sometimes right out of the garden and freshly made fruit juices. 

In conclusion: a little paradise in Medan!
title: Peaceful oasis in hectic Medan

text:
The rooms at Deli River Hotel are clean and comfortable, the staff are welcoming, the food is excellent and plentiful. The pool is fabulous after a hot day in Medan. Diana is a friendly, gracious hostess and it was a great pleasure to kick off our tour of Sumatra at her well run establishment. We highly recommend Deli River Hotel.
Thank you.
title: Well run comfortable oasis on the edge of the city.

text: We stayed for three separate 1 night stays, to break up our 3 week adventure in Sumatra. From the moment you enter the gate, you feel you have arrived somewhere special - a tropical paradise and the perfect place to escape the hustle and bustle of Medan and stop to rest and relax a while. We needed 2 rooms to accommodate us all and stayed in 6 different rooms on our 3 visits - all were excellent, clean, comfortable, well equipped and relaxing. The pool was delightful. The restaurant service and food good. The breakfasts were also good, especially the freshly prepared breakfast box for our 5:30a.m departure to the airport - much appreciated, thank you! All staff were lovely and keen to please and the manager went out of his way to talk to us about our experiences, while we were in the pool area. We really enjoyed our stays here and would not hesitate to recommend this hotel to everyone we know.
title: A really wonderful place to stay.

text:
We stayed at Hotel Deli River in June for a whole week. I came here with my husband and parents. We had a lovely and relaxing time here away from the hustle and bustle of Medan city. The staff at Hotel Deli made sure our stay was comfortable, they were very friendly and even helped us to arrange our spa massage and taxi transport to Medan city. 
The hotel has lovely greenery all round the compound and a lake with two pairs of geese. It was really refreshing to stay here and we were glad we made the right choice to stay here instead of a city location. The hotel has a "kampung" (village) ambience to it. We came to Medan to visit relatives of my mother. Highly recommended!
title: Relaxing & lovely staff

text: I got there late at night and had a misunderstanding with the cab driver and an employee was out right away to handle the problem! When i got settled in, I had a really tasty meal. The cook in this hotel is a real pro and makes great food! Also, within 2 hours the proprietor with the help of Dewi(an employee) organized an amazing itinerary to enjoy the rest of my time in Sumatra! I highly recommend this hotel to anyone I wish I could have stayed longer!
title: FANTASTIC PLACE TO STAY OUTSIDE OF MEDAN!!!!!!!!!

text: A great place to stay after a few days spent in the jungle and on Lake Toba. The room was spacious, and had an extra room with a trundle bed for our kids. Pool was welcomed by the kids after a dusty drive. Aircon in the room was working well. We had dinner in the restaurant which was tasty, and the breakfast was such a treat. Excellent service. Airport transfer was arranged by the hotel, and the driver was punctual and courteous. Thanks for a nice end to our holiday in Sumatra.
title: Relaxing stay

text:
A great hotel with a beautiful garden, nice swimmingpool and extremely friendly staff. Rooms were great also and the food is very good and reasonably priced.
Definitely a recommendation. A quite oasis in busy Medan.
title: An oasis in Medan

text: Lovely hotel in green environment with very well kept garden. Nice swimmingpool with fascinating view over the jungle. The service was excellent. This hotel had the most beautiful room during our stay on Sumatra. The food was delicious and reasonable priced. We can taste that they use fresh ingredients from their own garden. The sate and the peanut sauce was very delicious... Thank you hotel Deli River.
title: Lovely hotel in green environment

text:
Just finished a 7 day tour with Tri Jaya. In the lead up to trying to book the tour and gaining information they were very professional and prompt in responding too (which I felt was not the case for other tour operators). They were also very patient as I was trying to organise other tours in Borneo and Java at the same time. Ibu Diana who owns the hotel also made sure she came and spoke to us and made us feel welcome.

Our first night was at Deli River hotel - which is an amazing place hidden away and not that far from Medan. Is a great place to stay at if you've finishing/starting a jungle trek or trip to Lake Toba. The breakfast is also very tasty, we were given so much food we asked to have the cakes and fruit packed away in a lunchbox, which the staff were helpful about (as we were due to start our six day tour).

Over the next 6 days we stayed at accommodation (eco lodge bukit lawang, Mega Inn, Holiday Mikie Resort, Tabo cottages) from Bukit Lawang in the jungle right up to Lake Toba and the island of Samosir. My favourite part of the tour was the Jungle Trek and Elephant riding/washing. Probably because I love elephants so much too but had such a good time.

Our driver, Pak Yoel, was a safe driver who always punctual and very friendly. I felt that the price was also good and would recommend this tour to anybody who wants to spend 7 days in Sumatra.

Terima kasih,
Emma and Gary
title: Great hotel stay and 7 day tour with Tri Jaya

text:
We stayed here for a night before our trip up country and a night before going onto Java. We arrived on an early evening flight and got to the hotel just after 21.00hrs. The hotel restaurant closes at 9 but the chef has stayed in case we needed a meal. A nice touch. We were met by a wonderful lady in charge and showed to a lovely room in the grounds and she could not do enough for us. At breakfast we had fruit eggs spring rolls toast and jam pasries and cake a brakfast wonderful served by the wonderful lady from the night before. The owner also took time to come over and introduce himself and ask if our stay had been ok again a nice touch,
On our return we again were met as if we were friends and this time had an evening meal which was also very good and again a wonderful breakfast.
This hotel is out of the centre of Medan and if you are looking to go aorund Medan then you would need a taxi, however these are very cheap. There is also not much to see or do around the hotel, so you have to use the hotel for meals etc.
For a base before and after or just for a few nights rest this place is an ideal oasis with great friendly staff. A real gem
title: Quiet oasis in Madan's chaos

text:
If you want to be away from the busy city of Medan then this is THE friendly small and very reasonably priced hotel to stay at. Located on the outskirts of Medan in a beautiful tropical setting full of singing birds and tropical flowers and where you can cool off in a well maintained and pristine swimming pool.

Owned and operated by a Dutch-Inonesian couple (Dirk and Diana) who live on the premises and constantly look after your well being assisted by an English speaking staff.

Always working WI-FI and TV are available on the premises and in the privacy of your comfortable, clean, well kept and air conditioned room where the AC blower is not directed at you.

The restaurant serves delicious Indonesian as well as international food.

The same owners also operate a wonderful travel agency Tri Jaya Tours and Travel that can organize personalized trips of your liking throughout Sumatra and Indonesia while they can provide very reasonably priced private air conditioned cars with multilingual drivers and guides as I also personally experienced while traveling through Sumatra for 4 weeks.

Thanks to Dirk, Diana and their hotel and travel staffs they made a dream trip come true for me.
title: Highly recommended wondeful family run hotel on the outskirts of busy Medan city .........

text:
In my opinion, it is the most beautiful hotel that i have ever stayed so far in Indonesia.

If you are couples this is the best place in Medan.

Also convenient for families with kids.

Lake view unexplained. Just stay in the terrace and look at the lake with birds sounds.

Listen carefully for the birds songs. Enjoy write your poetry.

The staff are very friendly and the hotel owner is friendly.

Internet Wi Fi is available in ALL hotel area.

Swimming pool is clean and fresh water.

You can travel to Medan only to stay in the hotel.
title: Awesome, Fantastic place for holidaya

text:
We were met by a happy and helpful staff that took care of us. The owner talked to us, really relaxed guy, he offered us to go to the jungle for a 1-day trek with the locals, really nice, everyone was so friendly and helpful, some of them could give information about the different plants and trees we saw! I really enjoyed it and will definitely recommend this place to others! 
Food is good, good taste and hygiene was good. Ac is not pointing at you through the night which is good if you want to avoid getting the flu. Definitely recommended! 😃👌🏼
title: So good! Friendly and really helpful!

text:
We Stayed here for 2 nights before going to bukit lawang because we wanted to see the city. The hotel is run by a Dutch guy and his wife and it is located on the outskirts of Medan. Medan is very crowded and loud but as soon as you get to Hotel Deli River you can relax in the beautiful garden or by the pool.

The food in the restaurant is good and the menu has good variation. The breakfast was big and delicious with fresh food, toast and local dishes.

The rooms are big and clean, with a view over the garden. The rooms have air conditioning and the beds are good.

The staff is very friendly and the owner makes sure everything is taken care of. One afternoon we went with Dirch the manager on a trek with his hashgroup. We went to a beautiful place outside Medan, with lots of jungle and wildlife. Afterwords we ate food and had a few beers. Really relaxed atmosphere and good people.

I really recommend this hotel if you want to stay in Medan for a few days.
title: Great little paradise in a hectic city

text:
Peaceful natural surroundings.  The unique architecture adds to this feeling.
Polite, friendly knowledgeable staff
Owner managed I think, is always a plus to get that attention to detail and to deal with any issues quickly 
The place seems to be suitable for wheel chair use, although not to EU standard
The rooms are not generous (there are family rooms), but with a generous sheltered terrace and its 'jungle' surroundings, we did not spend much time in the room
Highly recommended for an extended stay or a quick refreshing stop in Medan on your way.  Unfortunately, I had only one night
In spite natural settings, unique building styles, it has all the modern trappings, good WiFi, beautiful pool, restaurant with a good wine list, flat screen TV. The breakfast was great, I felt it was made special for us
The owner is a keen hasher and I am sure he is happy to take you along into the jungle. This adds a rather unique experience to the stay. (ask him about it, if you do not know what it is).
Unless you need to be located in the city, the drive out to Deli River is very much worth it
title: The oasis

text: Friendly welcome, lovely attentive owners, lovely rooms and a beautiful spot. The food was delicious - all fresh ingredients. The pool was ideal. If you want a break from the busy hectic city of Medan, this is the place to go. Loved the birdwatching as well. Small touches like offering mosquito repellent were much appreciated. Good informative website. And owners open to ideas and suggestions.
title: Great hotel - it really is an oasis

text:
Hotel with birds in the garden

We stayed in Hotel Deli River and were impressed by the beautiful well kept and well designed garden with many species of birds. We saw the  Little Egret, Cinnamon Bittern, the Black Eagle and the Island Collared Dove. As birdlovers it was really a treat to stay in a hotel with such a tropical garden. We also saw different kind of butterflies and squirrels. Concerning the hotel, the service was very good, friendly staff, nice meals, the breakfast was abudant, clean comfortable rooms  designed with high taste and lovely colors combination with private terrace overlooking the garden and pond. Lastly we mention the well maintained swimmingpool which we enjoyed.
title: Hotel with BIRDS in the garden

text: Arriving here after a long flight was really great. It's a relaxed retreat not far from the busy city. The garden and layout is exceptional beautiful the room has everything you need though the bathroom is quite basic.
title: Great place to stay

text: We looove our stay. Shame! It was too short..we def.be back again. The staff were Super Friendly and helpful. The owner welcomed us warmly. The room was perfect. The breakfast was amazing. Totally worth visiting. Thank you River Deli Hotel.
title: A hidden gem in Medan

text:
Here is THE place for a relaxed stay away from the busy city and yet close enough to it. We enjoyed 16 days of GREAT breakfast which they adjusted to our taste. The  service from he friendly staff was awesome. Restaurant cooked for us without the spices! :) 
Swimming pool is nice. We used it twice every day.
Clean room. Good Airco. Accurate Shuttle to and from airport. 
We are already anticipating to return there next year.
title: This is an amazing place to stay

text: Love the àmbience there. Lovely place but am skeptical about hygiene of place and staff. And it's restaurant food too pricey. No fridge in room and there's only 1 aircon shared by 2 rooms. You will have problem if carry big luggage like us cos family luggage.
title: Nice place but hygiene average

owner_response.text: Herewith we feel obliged to react. For our hotel hygiene is of the utmost importance and as you can read in all the other comments people praise the cleanliness and high hygienic standards of Hotel Deli River. We have 3 rooms with refrigerator, these are the honeymoonrooms. Guests stayed in the family room. This room consists of one large room and a sideroom. There is 1 airconditioning with enough capacity to cool this accommodation. We never got any complaints about the coolness of this room and it is in use for already 3 years. About the luggage, of course we could have brought the luggage but one of the guests was in such a hurry and directly demanded the key before we could offer any extra service like calling our staff to carry the luggage. Concerning the price of our food: Guests had dinner in our restaurant with 4 persons and ordered the following menu: 1 portion fried prawn , 1 portion vegetables sauté, 1 portion chicken with tamarind sauce, 3 portions rice, 1 portion complete omelete, fried banana, 1 lemon tea and 1 big bottle of beer for a  total price of Rp 333.850 or US$ 23.00 which is a very reasonable price. In our restaurant we only use fresh ingredients without flavor enhancer or msg. When we approached guests and asked about their stay in the hotel they did not want to talk. Our staff tried their best to make guests feel comfortable but guests gave almost no reaction. Management Hotel Deli River.
owner_response.title: Tanggapan Pemilik

text: Hotel Deli River provides a beautiful, friendly and welcoming environment on the outskirts of Medan.  Although it is a little bit out of town it provides an excellent base for seeing the city and the surrounding region.
title: An oasis of calm amongst the hustle and bustle of Medan.

text: This hotel was very welcoming and the staff very friendly and smiley. they seemed to enjoy working there. The accommodation was very clean and set in a lovely quiet surroundings even though it was just outside Medan. We were upgraded to the bridal suite on our arrival to Sumatra and when departing. A beautiful room and bathroom. The pool was warm (mind the slopes) and set in the peaceful garden. All round a beautiful place to stay. I would definitely recommend a visit as a stop over when visiting Sumatra.
title: Lovely quiet surroundings just outside Medan

text:
We stayed here a few days to rest after a long trip and before watching orangutans. The place is beautiful with very clean and comfortable rooms and there are many friendly staff around to help. We enjoyed the pool and the beautiful gardens. The Dutch host helped us put a trip through Sumatra and Java together. They did an amazing job with this in a very efficient and organized way.
The restaurant has a nice choice of typical Indonesian foods and local fruits. The juices are delicious.
The only problem is that many of the staff do not speak much English.
title: Beautiful quiet oasis in Medan area

text:
This resort offers a total change of pace and surrounding from the city hotels. I cannot stand the traffic noise and congestion in Medan, this resort provides the respite from the very chaotic city.

The garden and public area of the mid size resort is well kept. The chalet style rooms are clean and comfortable. The restaurant serves very good food (lunch and dinner) and is even frequented by non guests especially during the weekend.

Service by reception staff is not friendly but the restaurant waiters are great. 

Just outside the resort (just a stroll), there are few Nasi Padang warung if you are sick of eating in the restaurants for all the time. There are also a minimart and local grocery shops. There is no fridge in the room though to keep drink cold.

Overall, value for money and a good stopover place instead of the hellish Medan.
title: Quaint Colonial Style Resort outskirt of Medan city

text:
You turn the corner from endless streets of noisy traffic, dusty-floored shacks selling sundry food or items, and down a drive into the Deli River property. It's almost surreal, surrounded by the peace and quiet of the (somewhat murky) pond, palm trees and imposing reception/restaurant building.

The pool is lovely, overlooking fruit trees down to a river. The only problem is that they divide this long pool with shallow/deep end dividers so you can't do laps.

The breakfast is very Indonesian (cakes, rice and a tiny bit of fruit), but sufficient. The restaurant has a nice dinner, and the staff we're accommodating (after they understand our English request) to us vegetarians. They also packed us an enormous "box" breakfast for our 4am departure to catch a flight to Bali.

The rooms were spacious, and had a tub as well as shower so we could do our laundry. The Wifi only worked on some devices! Strange.

The only disturbance to the peace was the evening prayers blasted several times daily from speakers in 4 parts of the city, seemingly in competition with each other.

Nice play to stop between Medan airport and the 2 1/2 hour trip to Bukit Lawang.
title: Luxury compound in the centre of Medan squalor

text:
We stayed one night at the hotel Deli River after returning from Bukit Lawang and before flying out to Banda Aceh.  It is a quiet hotel in a local area.  There isn't much to see or do if walking from the hotel, a car or taxi is needed.
The staff were excellent, the rooms very comfortable with lots of security, and the pool was great.  Its approx. 1 hour from the airport in good traffic and we were charged 350,000 Rph for the trip.
title: Great Pool

text: We opted for Hotel Deli River as our arrival and departure hotel for our jungle expedition from Ketambe. Very friendly personal. Dutch-Indonesian couple developed this and provide their guests with a comfortable environment. Restaurant affordable and good quality. And very kind to make us a breakfast package when we had to leave at 03.00 a.m. to catch our early flight.
title: Oasis of rest in busy, VERY BUSY Medan

text: We have enjoyed our stay at the Deli River hotel very much. Friendly and experienced staff. The rooms are in colonial Indonesian style with an eye for detail. They are clean, cosy and functional with a lovely balcony. The small hotel is set in a wonderful garden with a beautiful pond with lotus. The pool is nice and the owners, a Dutch historian and his Indonesian spouse, are experts on the history of Medan and Northern Sumatra. Their travel agency, Tri Jaya Travel, organized a memorable trip for our family in Sumatra, Java and Bali.
title: Elegant hotel in colonial style set in a tropical garden with excellent service.

photos.caption: Een heerlijk hotel in de tropen

text: The Deli River Hotel was our first stop in Sumatra after a long flight. It was a true oasis for us. The swimming pool was perfect, the rooms were spotless, with comfortable beds, and a lovely veranda looking out on the beautiful  garden. We had tasty dinners in the restaurant Omlandia. And last but not least, the staff is very friendly and made our stay from good to perfect :). Thanks to all at Deli River
title: Great first Medan days

text: After a two and a half week wonderful journey through Sumatra (thankyou Nasib for all the driving) organized by Tri-Jaya tours, we finished our time in Medan at their Hotel Deli River. It is not in the center of town but further out, away from the madness of Medan traffic. We found this to be the best accommodation during our time in Indonesia with staff that made sure our stay was wonderful. Even the owners took a personal interest in our trip and experiences. The room was very comfortable, food delicious and a pool to relax finished it off nicely.
title: An oasis in the madness of Medan

text:
30 min outside Medan, but do it - so peaceful and beautiful surroundings. The rooms are really nice, good beds and a nice bathroom.
The pool and area is great
And the food was really good as well.
Service was superb - e.g. got a large breakfast package with us, because we left before breakfast time.
title: Great hotel, nice rooms and peaceful area

text: I would rate this hotel between average and very good, but there is no option for this. Hotel situated in lovely surrounds with a lovely pool which looks out over the landscape.  Family room was a little crowded compared to some other places we stayed elsewhere in Sumatra for a lot less of the price (this might be just Medan thing). Staff were friendly and helpful.  Food was good.  I found them easy to deal with over the internet before booking.  We only stayed for overnight before travelling on.
title: lovely surrounds, rooms reasonable for price

text: We spent 5 nights at deli river at the end of our four weeks in North Sumatra. After a busy trip we wanted a peaceful four days laying by a pool eating good food and we had it all. The breakfast is fantastic with a lot of food. The staff are all very friendly and helpful. The room was beautiful and immaculate. We had a great time and would recommend this hotel as it is in a quiet part of Medan.
title: Fantastic hotel

text:
The hotel is a little bit out of the centre of Medan. Unless you really want to be in the city the location is fine. There is a village with a few shops and laundry so not as isolated as some of the reviews would lead you to believe. 
The rooms are very clean with A/C and hot showers. The restaurant is excellent but does close at 2100. Breakfast was included in the price. The other meals were in the upper price range by Indonesian standards but it is a hotel and in this case you get what you pay for. The hotel pool was a good size and well maintained. 
Last but by no means least, the staff were all very friendly and helpful. Dirk, the owner, even took us on a "hash", basically a hash through the jungle with a group of likeminded people. 
This hotel is a good place to spend a couple of days. It also has an excellent tour company, Trijaya, which I will review separately but is also five star.
title: Super hotel

text: Hotel Deli River is an excellent hotel to rest and start or end your journey in North Sumatra. Very clean, steaming hot shower, beautiful restaurant and helpful staff. Not far from Medan city to take in the palace, mosque and busy square. Nice relaxing pool, breakfast very good with a range of fruits, pastries and toast. Dinner was good and the bintang cold. Although an hour from the new airport, it is an interesting trip and transport is easily organised. Good wifi, wake up service and very friendly organisation.
title: Excellent stopover hotel

text: Deli River is clean, green and relatively calm. My room was ok but there was no bathtub and had only a  basic bathroom. There was a tv but only with local channels sadly. The wifi was fine and relatively fast. Since there is absolutely nothing around but a dirty and noisy street, guests must eat in the restaurant. The dishes are ok but pricy since there is 21% tax to be added. Unlike in other places in Indonesia forget about $ here everything is paid in rupies. 65$ a night (agoda) was too expensive for what was on offer even if an ok breakfast was included. There is an additional 50$ (two ways) for airport transfer.
title: Way too isolated and far from everything

owner_response.text:
The location of Hotel Deli River is the nearest place to Medan with a view of the Sumatran tropical jungle. Our rooms are set in a tropical garden and it takes around 40 minutes by car to the city centre. 

We have rooms with and without bathtub, all our Honeymoon Rooms have bathtubs and some of our Deluxe Cottages have bathtubs. Concerning the television, we have local television + 2 foreign channels, CNN and Deuthsche Welle (DW TV), both in English.

For the room prices, you can compare various booking sites as the prices differ per booking site and some sites offer lower prices. To ge the best rates please book directy to us.

The airport transfer return costs IDR 250000 (Indonesian Rupiah) equivalent to US$ 19 for two persons. 

We are a small internationally oriented Indonesian family company and we accept payments in Euros, Dollars and Rupiahs. 

Concerning the prices in our Restaurant Omlandia we give the following example: A Nasi Goreng costs IDR 57.000 which is equivalent to US$ 4.50.
